Actions.Name: Add a contact person
Actions.Description: Adds a contact person to an event.

Actions.Name: Create an event
Actions.Description: Creates a new event.

Actions.Name: Submit a form
Actions.Description: Creates a new form submission for a form

Actions.Description: Creates a new fund.

Actions.Description: Send a new custom touchpoint to Almabase.

Actions.Name: Delete an email address of a record
Actions.Description: Delete an email address of a record.

Actions.Name: When an email is created, updated or deleted on a record
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new email is created on a record or an existing email is updated or deleted from a record.

Actions.Name: When a form is submitted or an existing form submission is updated
Actions.Description: Triggers when a form is submitted or an existing form submission is updated.

Actions.Name: Get an event
Actions.Description: Returns information about a event.

Actions.Description: Returns information about a form submission.

Actions.Description: Returns information about a fund.

Actions.Description: Returns information about a gift.

Actions.Description: Returns information about a giving page.

Actions.Name: Get a record
Actions.Description: Returns information about a record.

Actions.Name: Get an email address of a record
Actions.Description: Returns information about an email address of a record.

Actions.Name: When a new gift is successful or an online gift payment is failed
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new gift is successfully recorded on a Giving Page by a donor or the payment to a gift is failed.

Actions.Name: List Contact Persons
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all the contact persons on an event.

Actions.Name: List Events
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all the events.

Actions.Description: Get a list of forms.

Actions.Description: Returns a list of funds

Actions.Name: List email addresses of a record
Actions.Description: Returns a list of email addresses for a record.

Actions.Name: List records
Actions.Description: Returns a list of records.

Actions.Name: When an record is created or updated on Almabase
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new record is created on Almabase or an existing record is updated.
